original_text: And over the course of the second month was Dodai an Ahohite, and of his course was Mikloth also the ruler: in his course likewise were twenty and four thousand.
korean_text: 둘째 달 반의 반장은 아호아 사람 도대요 또 미글롯이 그의 반의 주장이 되었으니 그의 반에 이만 사천 명이요

sentences.original_text: And over the course of the second month
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 둘째 달의 반열을 다스린 자는

sentences.original_text: and of his course was Mikloth also the ruler:
